seo.title: Filecoin Foundation
seo.description: Primary website for the Filecoin Foundation

left.heading: Let’s build the internet of everyone
left.subheading: The Filecoin Foundation is the steward of the Filecoin community. We aspire to put the power of humanity’s most important information back into the hands of everyone.

left.heading: What we do
left.description: We exist to help people build their vision on Filecoin to support the growth of the entire distributed web.

right.description: Join us as Thomas Jefferson argues with Alexander Hamilton in Washington D.C.

right.heading: Introducing the Filecoin Foundation with Marta Belcher
right.description: Join Protocol Labs general counsel Marta Belcher to learn about the Filecoin Foundation (FF).

left.description: FF provides resources, guidance, and fair, equitable principles to help the ecosystem flourish, and to open up the internet for a safer, stronger, and more reliable environment where everyone, not just a few giants, can thrive.

left.label: Resources
left.heading: Explore the Filecoin Project Ecosystem and Tooling
left.description: Decentralized networks aren’t bound by geography. The brightest minds around the world are working together to advance the next generation of the internet.

cards.title: Filecoin Documentation
cards.description: Filecoin project documentation homepage offers the tools to contribute to the network.

cards.title: Filecoin Github
cards.description: Contribute to Filecoin and help improve it by engaging in the Filecoin Github repository.

cards.title: Filecoin 2020 Mainnet Ignition & Liftoff
cards.description: This covers the timeline of the Filecoin Mainnet Ignition & Liftoff.

left.subtext: Watch: Introducing the Filecoin Foundation Team

right.heading: Meet the Filecoin Team
right.description: The Filecoin team continues to expand a growing workforce of professionals dedicated to research, development and community engagement around open source, decentralized storage, and nurturing  the Filecoin ecosystem. We’re still looking for talented grant program managers, communications professionals and more to join us in this mission.

left.label: Get Involved
left.heading: Learn how to get involved in the Filecoin Community
left.description: The Filecoin community includes thousands of developers, technologists, users, and enthusiasts all over the world.
